Fixed. When the breakpoint is set outside the source range of an IType, we 
caused trouble - i.e. a null IType caused an NPE. The simple fix (for M3) is to 
treat this as an external breakpoint (which creates an error message telling 
the user they have chosen an invalid position for the breakpoint).
Please verify, Luc. (See changes in ManageBreakpointRulerAction).

Verified.
I think it's the right fix.
